Baseline fetal heart rate 
• Differentiate between fetal and maternal heartbeats.
• A stable baseline fetal heart rate between 110 and 160 beats/minute is normal.
Baseline variability 
• Assess baseline variability by estimating the difference in bpm between the highest peak and lowest trough
